summary: I GOT THIS EMAIL CLEARLY STATING THAT MY 2019 TOYOTA CAMRY IS INVOLVED IN A RECALL, SO I SCHEDULED A APPOINTMENT AT NORTHRIDGE TOYOTA IN NORTHRIDGE CALIFORNIA ON NOVEMBER 27TH AT 8AM, AND THEY TOLD ME THEY DIDN'T HAVE THE FUEL PUMP REPLACEMENT. I'M VERY ANGRY, IT'S NOT SAFE TO DRIVE MY VEHICLE. PLEASE HELP!!!!!!    'YOUR VEHICLE MAY BE INVOLVED IN A SAFETY RECALL AND MAY CREATE A SAFETY RISK FOR YOU OR YOUR PASSENGERS. IF LEFT UNREPAIRED, A POTENTIAL SAFETY DEFECT COULD LEAD TO INJURY OR EVEN DEATH. SAFETY DEFECTS MUST BE REPAIRED BY A DEALER AT NO COST TO YOU.'    NHTSA RECALL ID NUMBER :20V682  MANUFACTURER :TOYOTA MOTOR ENGINEERING & MANUFACTURING  SUBJECT :FUEL PUMP MAY FAIL
